trans-unit.source: Manages user interface in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Gestisce l'interfaccia utente nella finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: When the BehaviorService is created, it adds a transparent window over the designer frame.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene creato il BehaviorService, aggiunge una finestra trasparente sulla cornice della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService can then use this window to render user interface elements, called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, as well as catch all mouse messages.
trans-unit.target: Il BehaviorService può quindi utilizzare questa finestra per il rendering di elementi dell'interfaccia utente, denominati <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>oggetti, nonché catch tutti i messaggi del mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: In this way, the BehaviorService can control designer behavior.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo, il BehaviorService possibile controllare il comportamento della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService class supports a behavior stack, onto which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> objects can be pushed.
trans-unit.target: La classe BehaviorService supporta uno stack di comportamento, in cui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>oggetti possono essere inseriti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: When a message is intercepted through the transparent window, the BehaviorService can send the message to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando un messaggio viene intercettato attraverso la finestra trasparente, il BehaviorService può inviare il messaggio di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>nella parte superiore dello stack.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: This enables different user interface modes depending on the currently pushed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo la modalità di interfaccia utente diverso a seconda del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> attualmente inserito

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService is used to render all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, such as selection borders, sizing handles, and smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Il BehaviorService viene utilizzato per eseguire il rendering di tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>oggetti, ad esempio i bordi di selezione, punti di ridimensionamento e smart tag.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService also controls many design-time behaviors, such as using snaplines, dragging, and selecting.
trans-unit.target: Il BehaviorService controlla inoltre molti comportamenti in fase di progettazione, ad esempio tramite le guide di allineamento, selezionando e trascinando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Cenni preliminari sul servizio comportamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Adorners property provides access to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di strumenti decorativi fornisce l'accesso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>gestito da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>

trans-unit.source: A collection of adorner.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di strumenti decorativi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> per la finestra adorner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> per la finestra adorner.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> in the adorner window to screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte un <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> nella finestra di strutturazione in coordinate dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value to transform.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> valore da trasformare.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Trasformato <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> valore, espresso in coordinate dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the adorner window in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione della finestra adorner nelle coordinate dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: The location, from the upper-left corner of the adorner window, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso, dall'angolo superiore sinistro della finestra adorner, nelle coordinate dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> starts a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> inizia un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> raises the BeginDrag event immediately before it starts a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>Genera l'evento BeginDrag immediatamente prima che avvia un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il rettangolo di selezione <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The adorner window is a transparent window that resides on top of the designer's frame.
trans-unit.target: La finestra adorner è una finestra trasparente che si trova sopra la cornice della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: This window is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> to intercept all messages.
trans-unit.target: Questa finestra viene utilizzata il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>per intercettare tutti i messaggi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: It also serves as a unified canvas on which to paint a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre utile come un'area di disegno unificata sulla quale disegnare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to translate.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> translated to the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di selezione <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> convertite nelle coordinate della finestra adorner.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> translated to adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il percorso di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> convertite nelle coordinate della finestra adorner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to translate.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating the location of c in adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto valore che indica la posizione di c nelle coordinate della finestra adorner.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> at the top of the behavior stack without removing it.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> nella parte superiore dello stack di comportamenti senza rimuoverlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> at the top of the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> nella parte superiore dello stack di comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>occupata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> completes a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> viene completata un'operazione di trascinamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> raises the EndDrag event immediately after the drag operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>Genera l'evento EndDrag subito dopo l'operazione di trascinamento è stata completata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> immediately after the given <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> immediatamente dopo il determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> nello stack di comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> preceding the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> che precede il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The immediately after behavior in the behavior stack, or if there is no following behavior.
trans-unit.target: Il immediatamente dopo behavior nello stack di comportamento, o se è presente alcun comportamento seguente.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Invalida la finestra dello strumento decorativo del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> method forces a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A>metodo forza un aggiornamento di tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>oggetti e, a sua volta, tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Invalidates, within the adorner window, the specified area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Invalida l'area specificata del, nella finestra dello strumento decorativo di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Invalidate method will force a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Invalidate impone l'aggiornamento di tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>e, a sua volta, tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The rectangular area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: L'area rettangolare da invalidare.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates, within the adorner window, the specified area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Invalida l'area specificata del, nella finestra dello strumento decorativo di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Invalidate method will force a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Invalidate impone l'aggiornamento di tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>e, a sua volta, tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The region to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: L'area da invalidare.

trans-unit.source: Converts a point in a handle's coordinate system to the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte un punto nel sistema di coordinate di un handle di coordinate della finestra adorner.

trans-unit.source: An adorner window's handle.
trans-unit.target: Handle della finestra di strumenti decorativi.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> in a handle's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> nel sistema di coordinate di un handle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> in the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> nelle coordinate della finestra adorner.

trans-unit.source: Removes and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove e restituisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> nella parte superiore dello stack.

trans-unit.source: Removes the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> from the behavior stack internally maintained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>dallo stack di comportamenti gestito internamente da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to remove from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> da rimuovere dallo stack.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> that was removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> che è stato rimosso dallo stack.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> stack è vuoto.

trans-unit.source: Pushes a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> onto the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> nello stack di comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The PushBehavior method is often performed by means of a hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo PushBehavior viene spesso eseguito tramite un hit testing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to push.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> push.

trans-unit.source: behavior is .
trans-unit.target: behavioris .

trans-unit.source: Pushes a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> onto the behavior stack and assigns mouse capture to the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> nello stack di comportamenti e assegna il mouse capture al comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Pushing a capture behavior is often done through a hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Inserimento di un comportamento di acquisizione viene spesso effettuata tramite sottoposta a hit test <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: If a behavior calls the PushCaptureBehavior method and mouse capture is lost, the behavior's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se un comportamento chiama il metodo PushCaptureBehavior e mouse capture viene perso, il comportamento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to push.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> push.

trans-unit.source: behavior is .
trans-unit.target: behavioris .

trans-unit.source: Translates a point in screen coordinates into the adorner window coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Converte le coordinate dello schermo in coordinate della finestra adorner di un punto di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value to transform.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> valore da trasformare.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value, in adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Trasformato <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> valore, nelle coordinate della finestra adorner.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando è necessario aggiornare la selezione corrente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes all selection glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Sincronizza tutti i glifi di selezione.
